code:
```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
  autonumber
  participant User as "User (browser)"
  participant DataPage as "DataPage Component"
  participant Store as "Zustand Store"
  participant API as "FE API (getNodes)"
  participant Controller as "Controller (GET /nodes)"
  participant Globe as "Globe3D Component"

  Note over User,DataPage: User opens Data page or focuses it
  User->>DataPage: mount
  DataPage->>Store: useEffect -> fetchNodes()
  Store->>API: getNodes()
  API->>Controller: HTTP GET /nodes
  Controller-->>API: nodes JSON
  API-->>Store: parsed NodeInfo[]
  Store-->>DataPage: set nodes (state updated)
  DataPage-->>DataPage: compute filtered, counts, hoverNode
  DataPage->>Globe: render(nodes=filtered)
  Note over User,Globe: User moves mouse / hovers over a node on globe
  User->>Globe: hover event (nodeId)
  Globe->>Store: onHoverNode(nodeId) -> setHoverNode
  Store-->>DataPage: hoverNodeId updated
  DataPage->>DataPage: find hoverNode from nodes and display details

  Note over DataPage: User filters/searches or clicks "Làm mới"
  User->>DataPage: type filter string / select kind
  DataPage->>DataPage: update local state (q / kind)
  User->>DataPage: click "Làm mới"
  DataPage->>Store: fetchNodes()
  Store->>API: getNodes() (repeat flow)

  Note over DataPage,Globe: Table below Globe mirrors filtered nodes
  DataPage->>User: render table rows for filtered nodes
```
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
